text: AI agents coordinating on-chain will replace most DeFi frontends.
The next wave is intent-based DeFi + agent swarms routing orders.
Solana memecoins are back. Launchpads are printing again.
Memecoin season on Solana feels inevitable. Tools for risk mgmt needed.
Restaking is just rehypothecation with better marketing.
Eigenlayer-style restaking is coming to everything, including DA.
DePIN narratives are shifting from hardware to distribution + demand.
DePIN needs real customers, not token incentives. Where is demand?
Perp DEX UX is still bad. We need better mobile + social trading.
Social trading on perps will be huge if onboarding is 10x simpler.
AI companions that can custody assets is a scary but inevitable trend.
Wallet UX: passkeys + session keys + embedded wallets will win.
Account abstraction + session keys are finally making crypto usable.
On-chain identity will be used for sybil resistance in airdrops.
Sybil resistance is moving to proof-of-personhood and device attestation.
